extendedInfo.description: This App is designed to enable heating engineers and plumbing professionalsÂ to calculate quickly and accurately the size ofÂ a central heatingÂ installationÂ in order to recommendÂ the correct products and dosage levels to protect and extend the life of the boiler andÂ systemApplying the results of the calculation will ensure that a system is correctly dosed and the benefits of water treatment fully realised. An under-dosed system may remain vulnerable to the effects of corrosion so for continued protection, check Protector levels annually.All Fernox products are Nitrate, Nitrite, EDTA and Phosphate free.

reviews.title: J lynch
reviews.comment: very good app to allow acurate dosing of the system, will use this lots, very good sales tool. thanks Fernox
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic tool!
reviews.comment: So important to dose at the right level. Used this app to work out system volume and buy the right amount of inhibitor. Customer happy, system protected for 25 years and no guess work
